body: Ethan, It is much harder to go from a mesh to a surface than the other way around but a simple script like this could work for you if your mesh does not have too many faces: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/XIzkNudAbb5eSwLupFtiyjumLr7pC88wtg1Qhk8OEe7h0xb0xuAe5QMK*g6habLOpISqoVuGx8EJv*Ao--nF4vagmwIXcfU7/Mesh2Srf.JPG) If you have a complex mesh, I think that you should be able to use Mesh2Rad to make a rad file that you can then connect to the "additionaRadFiles" input of the Run Daylight Simulation component. -Chris
